title: 'My son's head size led to doctors spotting rare vein condition'
description: Lucy says her son was diagnosed after a doctor spotted a rare condition at an unrelated appointment.
content:
"The consultant was looking at his belly button, and then suddenly wanted to ask me questions about his head."
A mother has described how a doctor noticed her son's "pronounced forehead" during an unrelated appointment which led to his rare diagnosis... [479 chars]

title: Erin Patterson tells police she ‘loved’ poisoned parents-in-law in newly released interview footage
description: Video shows triple murderer telling police her estranged husband ‘hated that I still had a relationship with his parents, but I loved them’
content:
The Victorian supreme court has released footage of Erin Patterson’s interview with police, conducted a week after she fed beef wellingtons laced with death cap mushrooms to her lunch guests.

title: Mandalorian actress Gina Carano settles with Disney over firing
